greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index of the least significant digit larger than one in the primorial base expansion of n, 0 if no such digit exists.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: (PARI) A328828(n) = { my(i=1, p=2); while(n, if((n%p)>1, return(i)); i++; n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (0); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 29 2019
